product_name: Merrell Trimaran Half-Zip Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Great for fast-paced tempo runs or a jog with friends, the Merrell Trimaran half-zip top keeps you covered but cool thanks to long sleeves and lightweight, moisture-wicking mesh fabric. Double-knit Opti-Wick(TM) polyester mesh wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping you cool and comfortable even when you start to sweat. Integrated UPF 20 sun protection continuously guards against harmful ultraviolet rays. Half-zip opening provides immediate ventilation when you need to cool off. Flatlock stitching, forward shoulder seams and seam-eliminating side panels minimize chafing and irritation. Merrell Trimaran half-zip top features a relaxed fit; reflective zipper adds visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Great for fast-paced tempo runs or a jog with friends, the Merrell Trimaran half-zip top keeps you covered but cool thanks to long sleeves and lightweight, moisture-wicking mesh fabric.
